product_name: Nite Ize Nite Dawg LED Collar Cover
long_description: The Nite Ize Nite Dawg LED collar cover helps your furry friend be seen in the dark. It fits over almost any dog collar and when turned on glows with bright LED light. Polymer tubing with a flexible, glowing LED strip closes securely with 2 micro rip-and-stick tabs. With a push of the button, choose flashing mode or full-time glow. Single, CR2032 3V battery supplies up to 100 hrs. of light in flash mode (75 hrs. in glow mode). Comes in assorted colors only; sorry, specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: The Nite Ize Nite Dawg LED collar cover helps your furry friend be seen in the dark. It fits over almost any dog collar and when turned on glows with bright LED light.
